alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 9:02AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Worcester and eastern Hampden Counties through 945 AM EDT... At 902 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Spencer, or 10 miles west of Worcester, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Leominster, Shrewsbury, Gardner, Holden, Southbridge, Clinton, Charlton, Spencer, Leicester, Sturbridge, Lancaster, Templeton, Rutland, Sterling, West Boylston, Westminster, Barre, Warren and Paxton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT for western and central Massachusetts.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester
